pid-lines.description: Number of processes to list (requires desklet restart)
pid-lines.tooltip: Set how many processes you want to display.

refresh-rate.description: Number of seconds for each refresh
refresh-rate.tooltip: Increase or decrease the how often the display updates.

top-command.description: The top command that is executed every refresh
top-command.tooltip: The command MUST return output in the standard `top -b` format.
